SELECT R.REQ_NO, R.REQUEST_DATE, R.REQUEST_TIME, R.STATUS, R.PAY_STATUS, R.PAY_AMOUNT, R.CONTENT, R.INSERT_TIME, R.PAID_TIME, R.LATITUDE, R.LONGITUDE, R.MASTER_NO, MM.NAME AS MASTER_NAME, MM.PROFILE_PHOTO AS MASTER_PROFILE_PHOTO, MM.ADDRESS AS MASTER_ADDRESS, MM.PHONE_NUM AS MASTER_PHONE_NUM, R.CLIENT_NO, MC.NAME AS CLIENT_NAME, MC.PROFILE_PHOTO AS CLIENT_PROFILE_PHOTO, R.ADDRESS AS CLIENT_ADDRESS, R.ADDRESS_DETAIL AS CLIENT_ADDRESS_DETAIL, R.PHONE_NUM AS CLIENT_PHONE_NUM, C.CA_NO, C.CA_NAME, CR.CA_NO AS CA_ROOT_NO, CR.CA_NAME AS CA_ROOT_NAME FROM REQUEST R JOIN MEMBER MC ON R.CLIENT_NO = MC.ME_NO JOIN MEMBER MM ON R.MASTER_NO = MM.ME_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON C.CA_NO = MM.CA_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY CR ON CR.CA_NO = C.ROOT_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND R.REQ_NO = #{reqNo}
